channel.title: Py Humble Games
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Games bundles!

item.title: Awesome Games Done Quick 2024
item.content:encoded:
Think you can keep pace with some of the most talented speedrunners out there? Test your mettle–and help support charity–with this bundle of stellar games, presented in partnership with Awesome Games Done Quick! Every game in the bundle will be featured during the marathon, which kicks off on January 14th, so you have plenty of time to get your reps in. Master the witchy, stylish action of Bayonetta. Fine tune your build to effectively conquer the madcap world of Borderlands 2: Game of the Year Edition. Hone your twitch reflexes in preparation for Celeste’s sublime platforming challenges. Get all these games and more, and help support the Prevent Cancer Foundation alongside AGDQ!

Keep up with Games Done Quick via their nightly Hotfix Streams, focusing on different genres and speedrun categories, as well as the AGDQ24 replays at  https://www.twitch.tv/gamesdonequick

item.title: Play Pink With Twin Sails
item.content:encoded: Snag digital versions of some of the most beloved tabletop board games ever created while supporting breast cancer research with the Play Pink bundle from Twin Sails! Get the epic masterpiece Gloomhaven, known for its intricate and innovative persistent world and high-stakes tactical combat. Engage in a cutthroat game of competitive economic strategy in the cult classic Terraforming Mars. Pad your collection with hits like Small World and A Game of Thrones: The Board Game, and get some great non-board games like the management sim Innchanted and much more! Pay what you want for 30+ games, expansions, and more, and help support the Breast Cancer Research Foundation!

item.title: Outright Heroes of Film & Television
item.content:encoded:
Ring in the New Year with the Heroes of Film & Television bundle from Outright Games, packed with a selection of family-friendly titles featuring some of the world’s biggest names in film, TV, and animation. Included in this star-studded bundle are games like:

  • DC's Justice League: Cosmic Chaos: Suit up as Batman, Wonder Woman and Superman and go face off against some of the DC universe’s most powerful villains in this open-world adventure.
  • DreamWorks Dragons: Legends of The Nine Realms: Soar through the skies, unlock and level up a team of draconic heroes, and save the legendary dragon kingdoms in this thrilling action adventure.
  • Transformers: Battlegrounds: Assemble a squad of your favorite Transformers, like Bumblebee, Optimus Prime and more, and defend Earth from Decepticon invasion in high-stakes turn-based battles.

Outright Games will donate 100% of their net profits to UNICEF UK. This will support UNICEF’s programs for children worldwide and its vital work in promoting education, health and nutrition, and responding to the needs of children impacted by conflict and natural disasters. More info can be found on Outright Games' blog post here.

*UNICEF does not endorse any company, brand, product, or service.
